(4,): As a system administrator, I want to configure logging, so that system activities and errors are properly recorded and monitored
(2,): As a data submitter, I want to track the status of my submission, so that I know its current state in the publishing workflow As a publisher, I want to prevent double publishing of submissions, so that I avoid duplicate data in the system As a UI designer, I want to redesign the Resources page, so that it matches the new Broker styles
(3,): As a data validator, I want to validate a submission, so that I can ensure data quality before publishing As a data manager, I want to update a FABS submission status, so that I can reflect its current state in the system As a system user, I want to create different types of submissions (FABS/DABS/FPDS), so that I can submit various kinds of financial data As a validator, I want to check submission-specific rules for FABS, so that I can ensure FABS data meets its unique requirements As a validator, I want to check submission-specific rules for DABS, so that I can ensure DABS data meets its unique requirements
(1,): As a system operator, I want to set a GTAS window, so that I can lock down the system during sensitive periods As a UX researcher, I want to report user testing results to agencies, so that we can gather feedback on system usability As a testing coordinator, I want to schedule user testing sessions, so that we can evaluate system improvements As a technical lead, I want to track Tech Thursday issues, so that we can address system problems identified during the session
(0,): As a data processor, I want to generate a D file for a submission, so that I can create standardized output files for FABS/FPDS data As a data steward, I want to process deletions for a specific date, so that I can maintain data integrity by removing outdated records
